title: BPSC Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 09 Project Manager Posts
description: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 09 Project Manager Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil, Electrical, Mechanical Engineering, MBA, B. Pharm, PGDM can apply for the BPSC Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the edu...
